• Search

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="search">

  • Tel

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="tel">

  • URL

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="url">

  • Email

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="email">

  • Date

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="date">

  • Week

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="week">

  • Month

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="month">

  • Time

  • DateTime

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

  • Number

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="number">

  • Range

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="range">

  • Color

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input type="color">

  • DataList

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <input list="country" name="country">
    <datalist id="country">
        <option value="England">
        <option value="Wales">
        <option value="Scotland">
        <option value="Ireland">
    </datalist>

  • Output

    +
    =

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <form oninput="x.value=parseInt(a.value)+parseInt(b.value)">
        <input type="number" id="a" value="50">
        <input type="number" id="b" value="50">
        <output name="x" for="a b"></output>
    </form>

  • Progress

    60%

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <progress value="60" max="100">

  • Meter

    20 of 100

    Search provides the user the ability to be able to...

    <meter min="0" max="100" value="20">
